name: Quick Throwing
source: Pathfinder #91: Battle of Bloodmarch Hills pg. 71
target: one creature/level, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart
text: Those under the effects of this spell become faster in the use of thrown weapons. They can draw thrown weapons (including rocks if they have the rock throwing ability) on their bodies or within their space without the need for the Quick Draw feat, allowing them to make their full normal rate of attacks with such weapons. This has no effects on other forms of ranged weapon ammunition.
savingThrow_zh: 强韧, 通过则无效 (无害)
